channel.title: CVE Feed for Ivanti -- MobileIron Core
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ivanti -- MobileIron Core

item.title: CVE-2021-3540|2024-08-03T17:01:07.964Z -- ivanti -- mobileiron%20core
item.description: By abusing the 'install rpm info detail' command, an attacker can escape the restricted clish shell on affected versions of Ivanti MobileIron Core. This issue was fixed in version 11.1.0.0.

item.title: CVE-2021-3198|2024-08-03T16:45:51.406Z -- ivanti -- mobileiron%20core
item.description: By abusing the 'install rpm url' command, an attacker can escape the restricted clish shell on affected versions of Ivanti MobileIron Core. This issue was fixed in version 11.1.0.0.
